right.text: I'm just a horrible person now. Accept it or not, that's what the case is.

left.text: And if you think for one moment I'm gonna try and trust you again after everything else because it's foolish of me to make that assumption on my own, you're dead wrong.

right.text: I should just tell you that everything I said was a lie. I should just choke up on the bat and tear apart everything you think just because it would be better for you than reality.

left.text: I'm never going to accept it. Not after all you've given me. Sorry. Feel free to leave if you really think you have to, but know I won't forget you. Ever.

right.text: You arrogant motherfucker. Get the fuck away from me right now. NOW.

left.text: You should, perhaps. But you won't. Because you aren't a horrible person.
